checking.testing

Class JavaProjectTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • checking.testing.JavaProjectTester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tester

    public class JavaProjectTester
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tester
    This class provides methods to run a JUnit test a given submission provided that there are JUnit tests files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JavaProjectTester(java.nio.file.Path tests)
      Constructor, creates a Tester from a path to a directory where the test lie.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TestOutput testSubmission(java.nio.file.Path submissionBinariesLocation)
      Runs tests in testLocation on the source code given in the parameter.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • JavaProjectTester

        public JavaProjectTester(java.nio.file.Path tests)
        Constructor, creates a Tester from a path to a directory where the test lie.
        Parameters:
        tests - Directory to the tests, in the Path constructor there should be a path.separator at the end, indicating that it's a directory (URLClassLoader wants it that way)

    • Method Detail

      • testSubmission

        public TestOutput testSubmission(java.nio.file.Path submissionBinariesLocation)
                          throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Runs tests in testLocation on the source code given in the parameter.
        Specified by:
        testSubmission in interface Tester
        Parameters:
        submissionBinariesLocation - The path to the compiled binaries of the submission.
        Returns:
        the TestOutput containing the test results.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Throws if the loaded Classes are not found
        java.io.IOException - Throws if the sourceCodeLocation is malformed or the URLClassLoader can't be closed.
